context: do you get 30 days for free ? when you buy this
response: Yes you should. Well the equivalent of it since it has since went free to play.

context: Does this game have multiplayer mode?
response: Yes it has 1v1 options for non-online matches, to play against the playstation opponent or just against each other. But u have to connect to the internet for more options, like more advanced matches. Hope this helps.

context: Is this compatible with the wii U? Thanks!
response: No, the Wii U is a totally different system, and therefore has all different hardware, drivers, etc. Same reason this won't work on Playstation
I use it with Win7 but there is not reason why I would not work with Win8

context: Do you have to provide a credit card to use this?
response: Just to buy it... It's an attachment for the hand controller of your Xbox 360 so you can text faster it comes with a one year subscription to Xbox live and very basic headset.

context: how are the buttons and joystick compared to sanwa? Or should I mod after I buy?
response: They are not bad at all. The Sanwas seem to return back to neutral faster even though they are a bit easier to push down. If you were going to mod I would recommend replacing the joystick before the buttons. I thought that mod was a major improvement over the stock stick. Hope this helps.

context: can u play this game without the nunchuck?
response: Actually you can; if you have a Nintendo Gamecube system just use one of those controls instead. But fair warning it really doesn't make that much of a difference with how challenging the controls are. But still a fun game none the less. This games real challenges your skills in gaming.

context: Do you have to purchase backs  with it to work? in other words what does it connect to?
response: No need to purchase other pieces for this to work. This plugs right into the front of your 360 controller. If you've got a rechargeable battery pack in the controller, it'll recharge that while you play (thus, "Play & Charge").

context: Will this work with X-Plane on a Mac?
response: Hi David, yes, it works well on a Mac in X-Plane. And if you intend to purchase the saitek pro flight switch panel that too will work, but you will have to download a plugin Sandy Barbour's xpluginsdk.org

context: I'm pretty abusive at times and sometimes break a joysick (Logitech and Saitek) in stressful combat or under duress. Is this stick durable?
Can you Turn off the BackLit LED anytime or no? And does the mouse have LED as well. Can I turn that off as well. What is the warranty on this?
response: The keyboard's back light is easily turned on and off by using the "Scroll Lock" button.The mouse has no button to turn the LED on or off, so it is constantly on.I have no clue about the warranty, but that doesn't matter.

context: Can it work on the Atari 2600?
response: Yes it can that is what we bought it for.

context: Can you play any game for ps3 on this system?
response: You can play all PS3 game discs, most PSOne discs, and digital games downloaded from the PSN. You CANNOT play PS2 discs in this model. However, some PS2 games have been remastered and are available as downloads for the PS3 thorough the PSN.

context: I ordered these assuming they were identical to the Xbox One controller analog sticks, however they are not. Are these still good/reliable?
response: Yes they are good but they will wear down faster than the official xbox ones but they won't fall apart like the stock ps4 ones. Assuming your replacing your ps4 joysticks

context: If i play in asia, it is work?
response: More than likely If you have a stable Internet connection. Yes ;D it'll put you in the best matches based on your region.

context: VS NBA 2K12???  I have 2k12 and like it. Can someone with experience compare the two?? Thanks
response: The graphics are better,  defense is tighter,  dink contest is easier,  my career is better,  easier to control the players,  no easy alley oops, tweaked online alittle. It is worth upgrading definitely

context: is it in English or does it have subs i want to know but either is fine
Is this an online only game? Can I play it offline ?
response: you can only play the Campaign, the multiplayer is Online Only
